attributes.action: immediately offer the post of Parliamentary Standards Commissioner to Ms Heather Brooke.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This lady has done more for the taxpayers of this country than she can ever be rewarded for.  Her appointment should be immediate and outwith the authority of corrupted politicians in the same way that our Judges are currently appointed - and cannot be sacked.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
